column2:
The  contention  of 
the 
learned  Deputy  Solicitor

General 
is 
that,  when  considering 
the 
injuries

caused  by 
the  appellant,  he  has 
taken  undue
advantage and has also been cruel to the deceased
and  therefore  the  appellant  should  not  be  entitled
to  get  the  benefit  from  the  exception  4  to  section
The  exception  4  to  section  294  of  the  Penal  Code
